description: Pahoran was the son of Nephihah and was the third chief judge over the Nephites (Alma 50:39-40). He reigned during a significant period of war between the Nephites and the Lamanites. Based upon the text, he appears to have been a righteous man.

pages.title: Pahoran Son of Nephihah
